segments.text: I need help preparing for my presentation on Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could help you with that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure you have the time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I promise you that I have the time to do this . If I didn't , I wouldn't offer to help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would be the best time for you to help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomorrow night would work for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , and I'll bring some information that helped me with my presentation .
segments.speaker: S2
